channel.title: Erm. Server auto restarter x.x
channel.description: Alright, i've played around with some stupid tuts in the tut section, but either they don't work, or they bring my server down and don't put it up.. Can [b]ANYONE [/b]post a method on how to get / make a reliable server auto restarter? It would be greatly appreciated. :S
